trans-unit.target: {2}{U}{B}：将目标生物牌从坟墓场放逐。派出一个为该牌复制品的衍生物，但它是4/4黑色灵俑。

trans-unit.resname: MP2·53 | The Scarab God | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去，在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: MP2·54 | The Scorpion God | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Scorpion God
trans-unit.target: 毒蝎神

trans-unit.resname: MP2·54 | The Scorpion God | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature with a -1/-1 counter on it dies, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个其上有-1/-1指示物的生物死去时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MP2·54 | The Scorpion God | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}{B}{R}: Put a -1/-1 counter on another target creature.
trans-unit.target: {1}{B}{R}：在另一个目标生物上放置一个-1/-1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MP2·54 | The Scorpion God | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去，在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它移回其拥有者手上。
